name: Loverowind
description:
Loverowind is a very short experience about the wind of spring.

Similar to my previous game Pluviophile, you collect flowers, and use them on the altars to reveal a poem. But this time you move much faster, unless the circles of light roaming in the world don't catch you.

Then in order to move fast again, you have to collect orbs which grant you speed for a limited time. After you unlock all the altars in the level, a huge sphere appears, and you need to catch it so the gate to proceed to the next level opens again.

The core aspect of this game is the atmosphere. It is recommended for those who mostly seek to experience the mood.

Save progression: The game saves your progression at the beginning of each level.
